remarks: The units of an integral domain have at most one subgroup of any single finite cardinality.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.) (Revised by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)
statement:
idomsubgmo.g $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) $.
idomsubgmo $p |- ( ( R e. IDomn /\ N e. NN ) -> E* y e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ( # ` y ) = N ) $.
$d G y $.
$d N y $.
$d R y $.
